sentences.english: Participants of a joint military-civilian meeting shall be decided on by conveners of the meeting.

sentences.english: The Convenor of the Committee must be an Independent Director.
sentences.chinese: 委员会的召集人必须是独立理事。

sentences.english: Haig scurries out, gathering men. Norton spins to Red.

sentences.english: Stay in touch with the task force convenors and monitor their progress.
sentences.chinese: 和任务组召集人保持联系，跟踪他们的进展。
